root.name: Shaman King: Soul Fight!
root.description: ModesStory Mode - Play as the main character, Yoh Asakura, in the story of the anime. Also, features the voice actors of the Japanese anime.Shaman Fight - A typical free-fight modeShaman King - A survival mode consisting of four fights. This mode can be used to level up characters for the Shaman Fight modeCharactersThe game includes 14 characters. Most of which have various forms that can be unlocked.Yoh AsakuraHao AsakuraMachhiKannaMarianTao RenTao JunChocoloveLysergMarcoIron MaidenÂ JeanneHoroHoroBokutou no RyuFaust VIII
